messages.subject: Re: Correction to Wikipedia Kondou (in regard of Tani)
messages.msgSnippet: Actually, I had compared with the Japanese Wikipedia articles... Anyways, here s my latest edit on the Kondo article: According to Tani Tateki (1837 - 1911)
messages.messageBody:
Actually, I had compared with the Japanese Wikipedia articles...
Anyways, here's my latest edit on the Kondo article:

"According to Tani Tateki (1837 - 1911) of the Tosa-Han, Kondo was properly executed
by the new government (formed mostly by the samurai of the Choshu-Han and the
Satsuma-Han) as a direct result of being accused of the murder of Sakamoto Ryoma. Even
after Imai Nobuo's confession in 1870, Tani insisted that Kondo was not falsely accused
for Sakamoto's murder."


~Seven


--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "k kobayakawa" <kobaya635@...> wrote:

> It doesn't say why he was beheaded.
> It just says when where he was beheaded.
> How about that?
>
> Saito Hajime
> http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E6%96%8E%E8%97%A4%E4%B8%80

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Correction to Wikipedia Kondou Isame by nlf7
messages.msgSnippet: Hey, why don t you guys compare with Japanese wikipedia? Kondo Isami on J-wikipedia http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E8%BF%91%E8%97%A4%E5%8B%87 It doesn t say why
messages.messageBody:
Hey, why don't you guys compare with Japanese wikipedia?
Kondo Isami on J-wikipedia
http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E8%BF%91%E8%97%A4%E5%8B%87
It doesn't say why he was beheaded.
It just says when where he was beheaded.
How about that?

Saito Hajime
http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E6%96%8E%E8%97%A4%E4%B8%80

Okita Souji
http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E6%B2%96%E7%94%B0%E7%B7%8F%E5%8F%B8

Hijikata Toshizo
http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%9C%9F%E6%96%B9%E6%AD%B3%E4%B8%89

Shinsengumi
http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E6%96%B0%E9%81%B8%E7%B5%84
